name: RespondFast
0:
”Alexa, open Respond Fast”
”Alexa, start Respond Fast”
”Alexa, launch Respond Fast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: respond fast
des:
Respond Fast allows you to take surveys – BY VOICE – that were created with the Respond Fast system.

Taking a survey is simple – just say “Alexa, Open Respond Fast”, and you will be prompted for a Survey Name (or Code) to initiate the survey. From that point forward, Respond Fast will prompt you with questions. Just reply by voice!

Answer the questions to completion, and your responses will be submitted.
